message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60% and you get 40%.
I think we can do better for both of us. I'm willing to give you 40% if you accept this offer. This will prevent further inflation and give us a fair split.
Bob, it's getting late in the game, and inflation is hurting us both. I'm willing to come down to 55%. Let's close this deal and avoid further losses.
